contents:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on the authority of Commonwealth v. McLaughlin Contracting Co., 293 Pa. 313, 142 Atl. 274 (1928); Pacific Lumber Co. v. Rodd, 287 Pa. 454, 135 Atl. 122 (1926); Shapiro v. Malarkey, 278 Pa. 78, 122 Atl. 341 (1923), and Rose v. Cohen, 193 Pa. Superior Ct. 454, 165 A. 2d 264 (1960).
Mr. Justice Eagen dissents.
Mr. Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
